thread.title: Wonderful little gem in Montmartre
thread.title_full: Wonderful little gem in Montmartre - Review of Le Relais Montmartre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Donna O
title: Wonderful little gem in Montmartre
text: We stayed three nights and will definitely be back. We were visiting Paris from Australia and wanted a French styled boutique hotel rather than an international soulless 'template' hotel. We were so impressed with Le Relais in every way. Beautiful decor, clean, quiet, wonderfully hospitable and friendly staff and perfect location. Thank you.
